body: Fan no Hitori's work can get so distressingly morbid. It's nice to at least see his latest work just involve a sexy girl trapped in a living wall and then presented as part of a free use buffet. The soul extraction things are simultaneously morbid and intriguing, which gets some confused enjoyment. I can very much leave any of the deformation/amputation/petrification as those just feel excessively cruel.
